title: I’m Having an Ethical Dilemma About Student Loan Forgiveness (Hour 1)
description:
Take our Audience Survey & Enter to Win a $500 Visa Gift Card: Click here to take the survey

Dave Ramsey & Kristina Ellis discuss:

Moving from credit cards to cash,

Should I apply for student loan forgiveness (an ethical dilemma)?

Missing out on the 401(k) match while paying off debt.
